;;;55     void WM_ShowWindow(WM_HWIN hWin) {

;;;56       if (hWin) {

000038  d012              BEQ      |L1.96|
;;;57         WM_Obj *pWin;
;;;58         WM_LOCK();

;;;59         pWin = WM_H2P(hWin);  
00003e  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000040  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_h2p
;;;60         if ((pWin->Status & WM_SF_ISVIS) == 0) {  /* First check if this is necessary at all */
000044  8b81              LDRH     r1,[r0,#0x1c]
000046  f0110f02          TST      r1,#2
00004a  d105              BNE      |L1.88|
;;;61           pWin->Status |= WM_SF_ISVIS;  /* Set Visibility flag */

;;;62           WM_InvalidateWindowAndDescs(hWin);    /* Mark content as invalid */
000052  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000054  f7fffffe          BL       WM_InvalidateWindowAndDescs
                  |L1.88|
;;;63           #if WM_SUPPORT_NOTIFY_VIS_CHANGED
;;;64             WM__NotifyVisChanged(hWin, &pWin->Rect);
;;;65           #endif
;;;66         }
;;;67         WM_UNLOCK();

00005c  f7ffbffe          B.W      GUI_Unlock
                  |L1.96|
;;;68       }
;;;69     }
